title: Update
body: League update slow and gets stuck at 99%

replies.body: The time it takes can vary depending on your connection downloading updates then installing it.  At 99% your patcher is still downloading files, so I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network just in case.  As long as there are no errors, I recommend letting it finish.  Let me know if you have any questions.
